widget.name: [The Circles Video Game]
widget.description:
Get Green Circles, stay away from Red ones
-Grasslands (Morning) -Grasslands (Afternoon) -Grasslands (Evening) -Walmart -Mc. Donald's in the Walmart/Dr. Dance Party's Secret Evil Lair
Control Justin with the arrow keys. Justin walks on dirt (brown) and bounces on trampolines (green), but whatever you do, don't touch the black blocks (not to be racist or anything).
Features: -Play as Justin and run, jump, climb, and bounce your way to victory -Cut scenes!!! -A lit soundtrack, none of which is copyrighted ;) -5 worlds and 3 boss levels based on Mega Owchies The Movie -Self Destruct Sequence!
Note: This game is BETA and may not work on some computers. Please tell me if it works on yours.
